attributes.action: Give England a vote on weather we want Scotland in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The perpetual in-out winging of the SNP
attributes.background: Sort out Scottish independence once and for all

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

It would be for the people of Scotland to decide whether Scotland should remain part of the UK. You can find out more about Scottish devolution here:

https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/CBP-8441/CBP-8441.pdf

You could start a new petition calling for an action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, for example a petition calling for a UK-wide referendum on Scottish independence.
